name: schema-based-json-editor
description: A reactjs, angular and vuejs component of schema based json editor.

scripts.build: npm run static && npm run file2variable && npm run tsc && tsc -p demo && webpack --config demo/webpack.config.react.js && webpack --config demo/webpack.config.angular.js && webpack --config demo/webpack.config.vue.js && npm run rev
scripts.static: cpy ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css ./demo/css/ && cpy ./node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css ./demo/css/ && cpy ./node_modules/dragula/dist/dragula.min.css ./demo/css/ && cpy ./node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/*.* ./demo/fonts && cpy ./node_modules/highlight.js/styles/default.css ./demo/css/highlight.js/ && cpy ./node_modules/markdown-tip/dist/markdown-tip.css ./demo/css/
scripts.file2variable: file2variable-cli src/vue/*.template.html src/vue.template.html -o src/vue-variables.ts --html-minify && file2variable-cli src/angular/*.template.html src/angular.template.html -o src/angular-variables.ts --html-minify

author: York Yao
